mapper.select: select id, btype, groupName, addr1, addr2, businessSummary, packageCompose, MarkYn, TagYn1, TagYn2, TagYn3, TagYn4, TagYn5, TagYn6, TagYn7, TagYn8, TagYn9, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from construction_case where UseYn = 'Y' order by id desc

select id, btype, groupName, addr1, addr2, businessSummary, packageCompose, MarkYn, TagYn1, TagYn2, TagYn3, TagYn4, TagYn5, TagYn6, TagYn7, TagYn8, TagYn9, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from construction_case where UseYn = 'Y' and btype = #{type} order by id desc limit #{page}, 3
select ceil(count(*) / 3) total from construction_case where UseYn = 'Y' and btype = #{type}

select id, btype, groupName, addr1, addr2, businessSummary, packageCompose, MarkYn, TagYn1, TagYn2, TagYn3, TagYn4, TagYn5, TagYn6, TagYn7, TagYn8, TagYn9, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from construction_case where UseYn = 'Y' and MarkYn = 'Y' and btype = #{type} order by id desc limit 3
mapper.insert: insert into construction_case (BType, GroupName, Addr1, Addr2, BusinessSummary, PackageCompose, ImageFile, ImageUrl, MarkYn, TagYn1, TagYn2, TagYn3, TagYn4, TagYn5, TagYn6, TagYn7, TagYn8, TagYn9) values(#{bType}, #{groupName}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{businessSummary}, #{packageCompose}, #{imageFile}, #{imageUrl}, #{markYn}, #{tagYn1}, #{tagYn2}, #{tagYn3}, #{tagYn4}, #{tagYn5}, #{tagYn6}, #{tagYn7}, #{tagYn8}, #{tagYn9});
mapper.update: update construction_case set UseYn = 'N' where id = #{id}
